hopobject.name: MyGTee
hopobject.body: Imagine crossing a PSP with an IPhone and doubling their capabilities... and building a handheld Linux device with: * OMAP 3530 processor * GPS * GSM * WiFi * SD card slot * camera * double joystick(see PSP) * stereo speakers * microphone * 2 480*320 LCDs * 1 nokia style 128*128 LCD * ... and whatever else we may manage to squeeze in
hopobject.shortdesc: A handheld device exploiting all the OMAP3530 capabilities
